Special Powers
YOU WILL SERVE OUR CAUSE MUCH BETTER AS A MARTYR: When Fabian Cortez KO's a friendly character with his Overload trait, gain 1 MISSION POINT per 10 full points of the characterâ€™s cost up to a maximum of 5 MISSION POINTS.
OVERLOAD: Once per turn, when an adjacent friendly character attacks, you may choose to modify their attack by +1, +2 or +3. If you do, after resolutions roll a d6. If the result is equal or less than the chosen modifier deal that character unavoidable damage equal to the chosen modifier.
I RENOUNCE YOU!: Empower, Enhancement, Leadership.

A.O.D.
I can definitely see his potential: If I was playing him I would use xmrf028 Professor X, affe024 Dazzler, xmxsL020: Fabian Cortez. You could use Dazzler's SPECIAL MUTANT LIAISON trait on Fabian, and than have Professor X swap himself and dazzler out using RECRUITING FOR A FUTURE THREAT. This would leave you with Fabian Cortez giving an adjacent person +1 range (shield TA), +2 Damage (shield TA) (Enhancement) from range, and +3 Attack (Overlord) all for 45pts.
